reviews.text: Bottled: Clean and sharp. My idea of Pilsener. Only gripe is it is not more widely available in other parts of the world.

It tastes and feels very artificial to me, like a carbonated drink with alcohol. One of the reasons why we Brazilians drink beer so extremely cold.
